description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Panharmonicon; designed as an illustration of an engraved plate, in which is attempted to be proved, that the principles of harmony more or less prevail throughout the whole system of Nature, but more especially in the Human Frame, etc" Author: WEBB, Francis - of Norton-sub-Hamdon, Somerset Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 527.m.23.", "British Library HMNTS RB.31.b.192."
